sections.heading: Investigation of sales of alcohol, tobacco products, electronic cigarette products, nicotine products, and cannabinoid products to underage individuals
sections.text:
Effective 7/1/2023

9-24-101.

Definitions.

As used in this chapter:

(1) "Center" means the National Main Street Center.

(2) "Program" means the Utah Main Street Program created in Section 9-24-102.

Amended by Chapter 160, 2023 General Session
